${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:ClearNewWorld.NAME: Clear New World
${modID}:ClearNewWorld.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Draw 1 random card of a different card type NL (Attack / Skill / Power)
${modID}:ClearNewWorld.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL ${modID}:Seek 1 card of a different card type NL (Attack / Skill / Power)

${modID}:TearlamentMerrli.NAME: Merrli
${modID}:TearlamentMerrli.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament ${modID}:Creature NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Mill !M! cards. NL If discarded: ${modID}:Evolve_shuffle.

${modID}:TearlamentScheiren.NAME: Scheiren
${modID}:TearlamentScheiren.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Mill !M! cards. NL If discarded: ${modID}:Evolve_shuffle.

${modID}:TearlamentHavnis.NAME: Havnis
${modID}:TearlamentHavnis.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL ${modID}:Mill !M! cards. NL If discarded: ${modID}:Evolve_shuffle.

${modID}:TearlamentReinoheart.NAME: Reinoheart
${modID}:TearlamentReinoheart.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Mill up to !M! card of your choice NL (Except Reinoheart). NL If discarded: Add this to hand and its cost becomes 0 for the turn.

${modID}:TearlamentKashtira.NAME: Kashtira
${modID}:TearlamentKashtira.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament ${modID}:Kashtira ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage. NL Cost [R] less for each Exhausted ${modID}:Tearlament or ${modID}:Kashtira. NL If discarded: Mill !M! card.
${modID}:TearlamentKashtira.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament ${modID}:Kashtira ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage. NL Cost [R] less for each ${modID}:Tearlament or ${modID}:Kashtira Exhausted. NL If discarded: Mill !M! cards.

${modID}:TearlamentKitkallos.NAME: Kitkallos
${modID}:TearlamentKitkallos.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament ${modID}:Elite NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. Gain [R]. NL If discarded: Mill !M! cards.

${modID}:TearlamentRulkallos.NAME: Rulkallos
${modID}:TearlamentRulkallos.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament ${modID}:Elite NL Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade ALL ${modID}:Tearlament cards. NL If discarded: Add this to hand and this card costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:TearlamentKaleidoHeart.NAME: Kaleido-Heart
${modID}:TearlamentKaleidoHeart.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament ${modID}:Elite NL Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Inflict !M! Vulnerable. NL If discarded: Add this to hand and this card costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:PrimevalPlanetPerlereino.NAME: Primeval Perlereino
${modID}:PrimevalPlanetPerlereino.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Whenever you play a ${modID}:Tearlament card, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Whenever you play a ${modID}:Tearlament card, deal

${modID}:TearlamentMetanoise.NAME: Tearlaments Metanoise
${modID}:TearlamentMetanoise.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament NL Inflict !M! Weak NL Gain !B! Block. NL If discarded: Gain [R].

${modID}:TearlamentGrief.NAME: Tearlaments Grief
${modID}:TearlamentGrief.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 1 card. NL If discarded: Gain !B! Block.
${modID}:TearlamentGrief.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament NL Gain [R] NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 1 card. NL If discarded: Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:TearlamentHeartbeat.NAME: Tearlaments Heartbeat
${modID}:TearlamentHeartbeat.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament NL Gain !B! Block. NL If discarded: Draw a card.
${modID}:TearlamentHeartbeat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament NL Gain !B! Block. NL Heal debuffs. NL If discarded: Draw a card.

${modID}:TearlamentCryme.NAME: Tearlaments Cryme
${modID}:TearlamentCryme.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL If discarded: ${modID}:Exhume 1 and Exhaust this card.

${modID}:TearlamentScream.NAME: Tearlaments Scream
${modID}:TearlamentScream.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament NL ${modID}:Mill !M! cards. NL Whenever you play a ${modID}:Tearlament card, all enemies lose 1 Strength for the turn. NL If discarded: Upgrade this card.

${modID}:TearlamentSulliek.NAME: Tearlaments Sulliek
${modID}:TearlamentSulliek.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament NL Whenever you play a ${modID}:Tearlament card, Mill 1 card and gain !M! Block NL If discarded: Upgrade this card.

${modID}:TearlamentPerlegia.NAME: Tearlaments Perlegia
${modID}:TearlamentPerlegia.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Tearlament NL Gain 2 Strength if you don't have any. NL Scry !M!.

${modID}:Mudragon.NAME: Mudragon
${modID}:Mudragon.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Elite NL A failed ${modID}:Evolution NL Deal !D! damage NL Gain !B! Block

${modID}:KashtiraShangriIra.NAME: Kashtira Shangri-Ira
${modID}:KashtiraShangriIra.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kashtira ${modID}:Elite NL Gain !B! Block. NL Inflict !M! stacks of debuffs based on the number of cards Exhausted NL ( Weak, Vulnerable, Poison, Slow, Lose Strength, Stun) NL Purge

${modID}:KashtiraFenrir.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kashtira ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage NL Inflict !M! Slow NL Exhaust 1 card NL ${modID}:Initiative ${modID}:Creature

${modID}:KashtiraUnicorn.NAME: Kashtira Unicorn
${modID}:KashtiraUnicorn.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kashtira ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage NL Inflict !M! Weak NL Exhaust 1 card NL ${modID}:Initiative ${modID}:Creature

${modID}:KashtiraOgre.NAME: Kashtira Ogre
${modID}:KashtiraOgre.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kashtira ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage NL Inflict !M! Vulnerable NL Exhaust 1 card NL ${modID}:Initiative ${modID}:Creature

${modID}:KashtiraAriseHeart.NAME: Arise-Heart
${modID}:KashtiraAriseHeart.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kashtira ${modID}:Elite NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal extra damage !M! per card Exhausted NL Exhaust

${modID}:KashtiraRiseheart.NAME: Riseheart
${modID}:KashtiraRiseheart.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kashtira ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage NL If you played a ${modID}:Kashtira card this turn: ${modID}:Evolve_self

${modID}:KashtiraBirth.NAME: Kashtira Birth
${modID}:KashtiraBirth.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kashtira NL Add a random ${modID}:Kashtira ${modID}:Creature to hand. NL It cost 0 [R] this turn. NL Exhaust

${modID}:ScareclawKashtira.NAME: Scareclaw Kashtira
${modID}:ScareclawKashtira.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kashtira ${modID}:Creature NL Cost 1 [R] less for each Exhausted ${modID}:Scareclaw or ${modID}:Kashtira. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal damage equal to your current Block.

${modID}:KashtiraOverlap.NAME: Kashtira Overlap
${modID}:KashtiraOverlap.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kashtira NL Exhaust a card. NL Gain !M! Vigor

${modID}:KashtiraPreparations.NAME: Kashtira Preparations
${modID}:KashtiraPreparations.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kashtira NL Whenever you're attacked, inflict 1 Weak to the attacker

${modID}:KashtiraBigBang.NAME: Kashtira Big Bang
${modID}:KashtiraBigBang.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kashtira NL ${modID}:Exhume 1 card NL Exhaust a card

${modID}:Kashtiratheosis.NAME: Kashtiratheosis
${modID}:Kashtiratheosis.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Kashtira NL ${modID}:Evolve 1 card in hand NL Exhaust 1 card NL Exhaust

${modID}:ScareclawReichheart.NAME: Reichheart
${modID}:ScareclawReichheart.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage NL If you've played !M! or more cards this turn: ${modID}:Evolve_self

${modID}:ScareclawTriHeart.NAME: Tri-Heart
${modID}:ScareclawTriHeart.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw ${modID}:Elite NL Dead !D! damage for each card played this turn. NL If your hand isn't empty: NL Gain [R]
${modID}:ScareclawTriHeart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw ${modID}:Elite NL Dead !D! damage for each card played this turn. NL If your hand isn't empty: NL Gain [R][R].

${modID}:ScareclawAcro.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw ${modID}:Creature NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you've played a card this turn: Gain !M! Temporary Strength.

${modID}:ScareclawAstra.NAME: Astra-phobia
${modID}:ScareclawAstra.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you've played a card this turn: Gain [R].

${modID}:ScareclawBelone.NAME: Belone-phobia
${modID}:ScareclawBelone.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you've played a card this turn: Remove all Block from the target.

${modID}:ScareclawLightHeart.NAME: LightHeart
${modID}:ScareclawLightHeart.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw ${modID}:Elite NL Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you play a card: Return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:PrimitivePlanetReichphobia.NAME: Primitive Reichphobia

${modID}:ScareclawNova.NAME: Scareclaw Nova
${modID}:ScareclawNova.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw NL Add a random common ${modID}:Scareclaw ${modID}:Creature to hand. NL It cost 0 [R] this turn.
${modID}:ScareclawNova.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw NL {modID}:Discover a common ${modID}:Scareclaw ${modID}:Creature. NL It cost 0 [R] this turn.

${modID}:ScareclawDecline.NAME: Scareclaw Decline
${modID}:ScareclawDecline.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw NL Draw cards until you have !M! in hand. NL Exhaust any cards remaining in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ScareclawDecline.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw NL Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Exhaust any cards remaining in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ScareclawDefanging.NAME: Scareclaw Defanging
${modID}:ScareclawDefanging.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Gain 1 Entangle. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ScareclawSclash.NAME: Scareclaw Sclash
${modID}:ScareclawSclash.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw NL Exhaust ALL ${modID}:Scareclaw ${modID}:Creatures and ${modID}:Elites in your hand. NL Deal their total damage and gain their total block. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ScareclawSclash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw NL Exhaust ALL ${modID}:Scareclaw ${modID}:Creatures and ${modID}:Elites in your hand. NL Deal their total damage and gain their total block.

${modID}:ScareclawStraddle.NAME: Scareclaw Straddle
${modID}:ScareclawStraddle.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw NL Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce this card's cost by [R] whenever you play a card.

${modID}:ScareclawTwinsaw.NAME: Scareclaw Twinsaw
${modID}:ScareclawTwinsaw.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Scareclaw NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards played this turn twice.

${modID}:MannadiumPrimeHeart.NAME: Prime-Heart
${modID}:MannadiumPrimeHeart.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mannadium ${modID}:Elite NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Repeat for each orb channeled this combat.

${modID}:MannadiumTrisukta.NAME: Trisukta
${modID}:MannadiumTrisukta.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mannadium ${modID}:Elite NL Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! random ${modID}:Mannadium Orbs.

${modID}:MannadiumRiumheart.NAME: Riumheart
${modID}:MannadiumRiumheart.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mannadium ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage. NL Remove all your Orbs NL If you removed: NL 1+: Gain [R] NL 2+: Add a MannadiumTrisukta to your hand. NL 3+: {modID}:Evolve_self.
${modID}:MannadiumRiumheart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mannadium ${modID}:Creature NL Deal !D! damage. NL Remove all your Orbs NL If you removed: NL 1+: Gain [R][R] NL 2+: Add a MannadiumTrisukta+ to your hand. NL 3+: {modID}:Evolve_self.

${modID}:PeacefulPlanetCalarium.NAME: Peaceful Calarium
${modID}:PeacefulPlanetCalarium.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Whenever you Channel an Orb, deal 1 damage to all enemies for each card played this turn.

damage to all enemies for each card played this turn.

${modID}:MannadiumAbscission.NAME: Mannadium Abscission
${modID}:MannadiumAbscission.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mannadium NL Remove your next Orb. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:MannadiumBreakheart.NAME: Mannadium Breakheart
${modID}:MannadiumBreakheart.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mannadium NL Ethereal NL Deal !D! damage NL Exhaust

${modID}:MannadiumImaginings.NAME: Mannadium Imaginings
${modID}:MannadiumImaginings.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mannadium NL Remove your next Orb. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:MannadiumReframing.NAME: Mannadium Reframing
${modID}:MannadiumReframing.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mannadium NL Remove your next Orb. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Inflict !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak.

${modID}:Trivikarma.NAME: Trivikarma
${modID}:Trivikarma.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain [R] equal based on its rarity. NL (Rare = [R][R][R] NL Uncommon = [R][R] NL Everything else = [R])

${modID}:ShatteredColorlessRealm.NAME: Shattered Realm
${modID}:ShatteredColorlessRealm.DESCRIPTION: Chose one: NL 1. Exhaust ALL cards. Add 1 ${modID}:ViciousAtraloud to your hand. NL Heal 7 health. NL Purge.

${modID}:RealmResonance.NAME: Worlds as One
${modID}:RealmResonance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies NL Gain !B! Block NL Inflict !M! Vulnerable and Weak on ALL enemies.

${modID}:VisasSamsara.NAME: Path to Samsara
${modID}:VisasSamsara.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL 1. Gain !M! Strength. NL 2. Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain [R]. NL Draw !M! cards.
${modID}:VisasSamsara.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL 1. Gain !M! Strength. NL 2. Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain [R][R]. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:SharvSarga.NAME: Sharv Sarga
${modID}:SharvSarga.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle ALL card in your hand into your draw pile. NL Draw the same number of cards.

${modID}:LokaSamsara.NAME: Loka Samsara
${modID}:LokaSamsara.DESCRIPTION: Get Frozen Eye. NL Remove this card from your deck.

${modID}:Veda Kalanta.NAME: VedaKalanta
${modID}:Veda Kalanta.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Creature NL Cost [R] less for each time you lose HP this combat. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this card costed 0: ${modID}:Evolve_self.

${modID}:RealmElegy.NAME: Realm Elegy
${modID}:RealmElegy.DESCRIPTION: Lost 1 health !M! times. NL Gain !B! Block !M! times.

${modID}:RealmEulogy.NAME: Realm Eulogy
${modID}:RealmEulogy.DESCRIPTION: Lost 1 health !D! times (affected by Strength). NL Gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:VedaKalarcanum.NAME: Veda Kalarcanum
${modID}:VedaKalarcanum.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Elite NL If X is less than !M!: Gain X [R] and shuffle this card into your draw pile. NL Otherwise: Stun an enemy.
